Of course, the irony is that it all took place at the height of the 'hacking' scandal perpetrated by the national newspapers against 'celebrities', some of whom have now received substantial compensation. [...] Paul reynolds 2015-03-06T04:56:28+00:00 2015-03-06T04:56:28+00:00 CFP INSEP2015 \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd Violence, Representations and Sexuality https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CAPITAL-AND-CLASS;6bd44041.1503 CFP INSEP2015 \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd Violence, Representations and Sexuality<br>Fifth International Conference of the<br>International Network for Sexual Ethics and Politics \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd INSEP<br>13th \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd 15th July, 2015, Ghent University, Belgium<br>Hosted by CEVI \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd Centre for Ethics and Value Inquiry<br>Faculty of Arts and Philosophy<br>Ghent University, Blandijnberg 2<br>9000 Ghent \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd Belgium<br>http://www.insep.ugent.be/insep2015/<br>General Conference Theme \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd Violence, Representations and Sexuality<br>The relationship between violence and sexuality is one of the most critical areas of engagement for<br>sex and sexuality research and activism. There continues to be an epidemic of violence against<br>women and children \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd rape, sexual assault, sexual [...] Paul reynolds 2015-03-06T04:56:00+00:00 2015-03-06T04:56:00+00:00 \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdNew Directions in Reconciling Solidarity and Difference in Contemporary Societies\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd July 2015 https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CAPITAL-AND-CLASS;a501e8bb.1503 4TH INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE<br><br>CULTURAL DIFFERENCE AND SOCIAL SOLIDARITY NETWORK<br>\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdNew Directions in Reconciling Solidarity and Difference in Contemporary Societies\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd<br>www.differenceandsolidarity.org<br><br>Hosted by Middle East Technical University - Northern Cyprus Campus<br>June 30th \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd July 3rd 2015<br><br>Strategies for addressing problems of social solidarity in states and communities in a contemporary globalized world while respecting difference and diversity within the boundaries of those communities have become more important than ever with the problematization \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd and some would say decline \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd of multiculturalist solutions. In the last decades there has been a rise in moral panics about immigration and right-wing nationalist responses, [...] Christian Fuchs 2015-03-03T10:00:39+00:00 2015-03-03T10:00:39+00:00 CAMRI seminar: Des Freedman on Media Policy Fetishism https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CAPITAL-AND-CLASS;ecca1671.1503 Des Freedman: Media Policy Fetishism<br>CAMRI Seminar<br>Wed, March 11, 2015<br>Univ of Westminster, Harrow Campus<br>14:00<br>Room A7.01<br><br>http://www.westminster.ac.uk/camri/research-seminars/des-freedman-media-policy-fetishism<br><br>Registration: e-mail to christian.fuchs@uti.at<br><br>Why do ordinary users have so little input into or interest in the<br>formal decisionmaking processes that shape our media systems? This<br>presentation suggests that we focus on the fetishism of the media policy<br>process, understood as the loss of control over the decisionmaking arena<br>and as the outsourcing of political agency to external forces. It<br>focuses on both the dimensions of \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdeveryday fetishism\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd (its capacity to<br>naturalize commodification processes and to reify social life) as [...] Antoine Dolcerocca 2015-03-02T14:53:17+01:00 2015-03-02T14:53:17+01:00 Zizek on Syriza: Indebted yes, but not Guilty! https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CAPITAL-AND-CLASS;546a3c9e.1503 "The idea one gets from our media is that the Syriza government in Greece<br>is composed of a bunch of populist extremists who advocate \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdirrational\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd and<br>\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdirresponsible\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd populist measures. Nothing can be further from the truth.<br>It is, on the contrary, EU politics which have been, and continue to be,<br>obviously irrational. Since 2008, Greece has been forced to enact tough<br>austerity measures to put its finances in order; yet today, seven years<br>later, after the country suffered a terrifying setback, Greek finances are<br>in an even greater disorder. Indeed, the country\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds debt rose from slightly<br>above 100% of GDP [...] VersoMail Verso 2015-02-27T13:02:10+00:00 2015-02-27T13:02:10+00:00 THE EXTREME CENTRE - TARIQ ALI - NEW FROM Guardian here: http://www.theguardian.com/politics/2015/feb/20/tariq-ali-interview-renationalise-the-railways Chris Ford 2015-02-25T14:26:50-05:00 2015-02-25T14:26:50-05:00 SLAVERY IN THE \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdDNR\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd AND \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdLNR\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CAPITAL-AND-CLASS;1d0c2937.1502 from Luhanksk https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CAPITAL-AND-CLASS;e37b6730.1502 For your information:<br><br>Interview with a leader of the Independent Miners Union driven out of<br>Luhansk:<br><br>http://observerukraine.net/2015/02/25/the-luhansk-peoples-republic-doesnt-need-independent-unions-and-registering-them-is-now-prohibited/ Chris Ford 2015-02-25T07:07:24-05:00 2015-02-25T07:07:24-05:00 Re: Evidence form the Independent Union of Mineworkers https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CAPITAL-AND-CLASS;4d800fe0.1502 Thanks Paul,<br><br>I pretty much agree it is for the Ukrainian people as a whole to<br>determine their future.<br><br>I would have hope Alan Freeman would aknowledge at least the validity<br>and genuine nature of the Independent Miners Union's reports of their<br>difficulties after making such robust criticism.<br><br>Sadly the website he circulated NewColdWar has shown no such effort to<br>correct their inaccuracies. [...] Paul Stewart 2015-02-25T09:22:37+00:00 2015-02-25T09:22:37+00:00 Re: Evidence form the Independent Union of Mineworkers https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CAPITAL-AND-CLASS;4707deb6.1502 Dear Chris,<br>Thanks for this. Although like most posts, and especially when things get heated, in my inept handling of the experience participation quickly reduces to one or two people so that it's not a broad encompassing 'debate' of kind techies pined for years back when social media took off. Eventually you find yourself wondering if the two / three wouldn't maybe be better having a phone call about it. Still, all I'd want to add is that whatever the motivation of people denying (or not wanting to know? I don't know why it's being gainsaid or seen with suspicion) [...] Chris Ford 2015-02-25T02:11:38-05:00 2015-02-25T02:11:38-05:00 Evidence form the Independent Union of Mineworkers https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CAPITAL-AND-CLASS;cfbc6cb8.1502 Dear comrades,<br><br>I have presented to Capital and Class list members - though it does not<br>appear to have been circulated - further and frankly irrefutable evidence from<br>the Independent Mineworkers Union of their difficulties which are<br>continuing. Nikolai Kozuberda a leader of the Independent union has now had to<br>leave his home following<br>intimidation.<br><br>http://npg.social/title/275/<br><br>This shall be published this later today in full translation along with<br>further information form the union on the ban on independent trade unions. [...] Chris Ford 2015-02-24T08:15:01-05:00 2015-02-24T08:15:01-05:00 Some helpful facts on the Ukrainian miners union https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CAPITAL-AND-CLASS;fa658a3d.1502 Comrades,<br><br>To those who read Russian this may be helpful - it is the local Branch<br>of the Independent Miners Union - which an internationally recognised<br>union of many years standing in the labour movement.<br><br>http://npg.social/title/275/<br><br>And this is the NPGU/KVPU activist of coal mine \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdRussia\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd Olexander Vovk<br>as he arrived to Kyiv after being kidnapped and tortured by the Russian<br>para-miitaries in Donbas. [...] VersoMail Verso 2015-02-24T13:13:37+00:00 2015-02-24T13:13:37+00:00 WELCOME TO THE DESERT OF POST-SOCIALISM: RADICAL POLITICS AFTER YUGOSLAVIA https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CAPITAL-AND-CLASS;cdef5b34.1502 OUT NOW FROM VERSO:<br><br>WELCOME TO THE DESERT OF POST-SOCIALISM: RADICAL POLITICS AFTER YUGOSLAVIA<br><br>EDITED BY SRECKO HORVAT AND IGOR STIKS<br><br>\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdA must for everyone who wants to understand the post-Communist transition from bad to worse.\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd Slavoj Zizek<br><br>http://www.versobooks.com/books/1781-welcome-to-the-desert-of-post-socialism Andrew Kliman 2015-02-23T22:29:52-05:00 2015-02-23T22:29:52-05:00 Re: Independent Unions Banned by Russian Seperatists in LNR https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CAPITAL-AND-CLASS;54559b50.1502 I have colleagues on both sides of the dispute on this list. I\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdll try to be as objective as possible.<br><br>Is there a list policy about matters like this? If so, it should be communicated and applied. If not, I don\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdt favor making up one on the spot to apply to an individual case. [...] Chris Ford 2015-02-23T23:43:32+00:00 2015-02-23T23:43:32+00:00 Re: Independent Unions Banned by Russian Seperatists in LNR https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CAPITAL-AND-CLASS;259b64f.1502 The question I really must pose is why would a long established, internationally recognised trade union be engaged in producing a forgery?<br>When they already have members proven to have been kidnapped in Donetsk and tortured. Had people killed. Do they really need to forge documents of non-recognition?<br>Sent from my BlackBerry\ufffd\ufffd wireless device [...] Chris Ford 2015-02-23T23:29:59+00:00 2015-02-23T23:29:59+00:00 Re: Independent Unions Banned by Russian Seperatists in LNR https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CAPITAL-AND-CLASS;3011ee22.1502 If Alan wants full details of comrades in the miners union in Donbas nicely published and placing them in an even more vulnerable position it won't happen. Anymore than Colombia Solidarity would publish fine details.<br>But he can talk to the Independent Miners Union directly, if he actually cares about them. Their details are publically available as are their reports. I am sure they will be very happy to hear from him.<br>. [...] Chris Ford 2015-02-23T23:22:34+00:00 2015-02-23T23:22:34+00:00 Re: Independent Unions Banned by Russian Seperatists in LNR https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CAPITAL-AND-CLASS;1e01b86.1502 Alan,<br><br>Who are you to demand independently checked evidence? When you see appeals from unions in Colombia, do you make such demands or call them liars until you get what you consider verified?<br><br>I fully endorse the Ukrainian miners union, whereas you endorse Russian national chauvinists. My motives are solidarity with the existing labour movement in Ukraine. Yours are not. [...] Alan Freeman 2015-02-23T16:47:11-06:00 2015-02-23T16:47:11-06:00 Re: Independent Unions Banned by Russian Seperatists in LNR https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CAPITAL-AND-CLASS;f170d51a.1502 My name is Alan, not Allan.<br><br>I am not defending anyone\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds reputation. I am defending truth in reporting.<br><br>www.newcoldwar.org <http://www.newcoldwar.org> published and circulated a response to the USC\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds claim, but unlike the USC, we made no claim that it is true or false. Circulating claims is not the same as endorsing them. What I did not is in advance of checking its claims assert that the circulated statement was true. I am happy to communicate Chris\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds objections to our sources, as any responsible person would. I am sure they will be most interested in them. And if the evidence surfaces [...] Chris Ford 2015-02-23T16:48:51-05:00 2015-02-23T16:48:51-05:00 Re: Independent Unions Banned by Russian Seperatists in LNR https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CAPITAL-AND-CLASS;921fbef2.1502 Comrades,<br>It is very simple:<br>The document whs been received by the Independent Miners Trade Union of<br>Baracova mine, and further circulated by union activists in Ukraine.<br>The \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdLuhansk Peoples Republic\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd Ministry of Justice order came out<br>immediately after the union filed an application for registration. Not a<br>coincidence.<br>I expect more materials to be issued from the miners soon \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd that is unless<br>they are subjected to violent repression which is entirely possible.<br>Why is Allan Freeman\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds word more authentic than the miners union? He<br>simply makes claims it is not on the LNR website and as such must [...] Denis, Andy 2015-02-23T20:45:05+00:00 2015-02-23T20:45:05+00:00 Re: Independent Unions Banned by Russian Seperatists in LNR https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CAPITAL-AND-CLASS;b5443933.1502 Dear Chris<br><br>I am on no particular side here, and indeed don\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdt really know what the sides are. I tend to side with trade unions by default, but am well aware that sometimes they take very reaction positions which cannot be supported \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd in South Africa, Israel, and Northern Ireland, at various times, for example. [...] Chris Ford 2015-02-23T14:57:08-05:00 2015-02-23T14:57:08-05:00 Re: Independent Unions Banned by Russian Seperatists in LNR https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CAPITAL-AND-CLASS;910a809b.1502 Surprising how much Allan wants to defend the reputation of the warlords<br>in Luhansk. I don\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdt remember any such cries when miners union activists<br>were being murdered and kidnapped. Bizarre.<br>Who is a more credible source on matters related to the Ukrainian miners \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd<br>an academic in Canada who makes no secret of his sympathy for the Russian<br>forces - or the long established miners trade union in Ukraine.<br>Allan circulates lies that linked the document to Defence of Labour Trade<br>Union in Kyiv - when it has been circulated widely by activists of<br>Independent Mineworkers Union of Ukraine. Who [...] Alan Freeman 2015-02-23T12:23:07-06:00 2015-02-23T12:23:07-06:00 Re: Independent Unions Banned by Russian Seperatists in LNR https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CAPITAL-AND-CLASS;a9bc3177.1502 The most telling fact is not that Chris fails to provide corroboration, but<br>that he refuses to. Instead, he bases his defence on the principle of<br>authority, which is an ecclesiastical defence, not a scientific one. A basic<br>principle of truth is independent corroboration and this is what he rejects.<br><br>It is precisely in order to bring killing to a halt that we need truth. The<br>baseless murder of countless Iraqis was directly facilitated by the lie that<br>Saddam Hussain possessed weapons of mass destruction. [...] Tae-Hee Jo 2015-02-23T08:33:02-05:00 2015-02-23T08:33:02-05:00 French Association of Political Economy: an international campaign, "Pluralism Now!" https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CAPITAL-AND-CLASS;bacedfc9.1502 Dear Heterodox Economists,<br><br>Below is a petition/campaign organized by the French Association of<br>Political Economy. I am forwarding this message on behalf of Bruno Tinel.<br><br>**<br>*The French Association of Political Economy is now launching an<br>international campaign called "Pluralism Now!". Please sign the petition.*<br><br>Your help to promote this petition and disseminate informations about it<br>would be much appreciated. [...] VersoMail Verso 2015-02-23T13:23:52+00:00 2015-02-23T13:23:52+00:00 THIS WEEK! FRANCO 'BIFO' BERARDI's launch events for his new book HEROES: MASS MURDER AND SUICIDE https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CAPITAL-AND-CLASS;a99b43bd.1502 OUT NOW:<br><br>HEROES: MASS MURDER AND SUICIDE<br><br>BY FRANCO "BIFO" BERARDI<br><br>What is the relationship between capitalism and mental health?<br><br>http://www.versobooks.com/books/1746-heroes Julian Wells 2015-02-23T12:55:22+00:00 2015-02-23T12:55:22+00:00 Re: Independent Unions Banned by Russian Seperatists in LNR https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CAPITAL-AND-CLASS;5464b129.1502 For the record, I deplore the murder of any workers, whether they belong to independent, "independent" or thoroughly dependent yellow trade unions (or indeed none at all).<br><br>As Alan Freeman has attempted to explain to you, if the document in question is genuine it can presumably be traced to some official source. [...] Chris Ford 2015-02-23T12:40:48+00:00 2015-02-23T12:40:48+00:00 Re: Independent Unions Banned by Russian Seperatists in LNR https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CAPITAL-AND-CLASS;42a3fe8d.1502 I must say it is rather disappointing some people are so upset about this but have never said a word about the murder of Independent Miners Union activists widely publicised.<br>Chris<br>Sent from my BlackBerry\ufffd\ufffd wireless device<br><br>-----Original Message-----<br>From: cpford@aol.com<br>Date: Mon, 23 Feb 2015 12:32:20<br>To: Julian Wells<julianwells@gn.apc.org>; Alan Freeman<afreeman@iwgvt.org><br>Reply-To: cpford@aol.com<br>Cc: <CAPITAL-AND-CLASS@JISCMAIL.AC.UK><br>Subject: Re: Independent Unions Banned by Russian Seperatists in LNR [...] Chris Ford 2015-02-23T12:32:20+00:00 2015-02-23T12:32:20+00:00 Re: Independent Unions Banned by Russian Seperatists in LNR https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CAPITAL-AND-CLASS;3d8afbda.1502 The idea this was forged by Oleg Vernik of Defence of Labour is just groundless smears. When it was originally published by the Independent Miners Union in Ukraine.<br>Sent from my BlackBerry\ufffd\ufffd wireless device<br><br>-----Original Message-----<br>From: Julian Wells <julianwells@gn.apc.org><br>Date: Mon, 23 Feb 2015 12:04:02<br>To: Chris Ford<cpford@AOL.COM>; Alan Freeman<afreeman@iwgvt.org><br>Cc: <CAPITAL-AND-CLASS@JISCMAIL.AC.UK><br>Subject: Re: Independent Unions Banned by Russian Seperatists in LNR [...] Wells, Julian 2015-02-23T12:29:48+00:00 2015-02-23T12:29:48+00:00 Re: Independent Unions Banned by Russian Seperatists in LNR https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CAPITAL-AND-CLASS;6d66e477.1502 Chris,<br><br>Can you produce any evidence that it's genuine?<br><br>Julian<br><br>-----Original Message-----<br>From: To complement the journal 'Capital and Class' (ISSN 0 309 8786) [mailto:CAPITAL-AND-CLASS@JISCMAIL.AC.UK] On Behalf Of Chris Ford<br>Sent: 23 February 2015 12:26<br>To: CAPITAL-AND-CLASS@JISCMAIL.AC.UK<br>Subject: Re: [CAPITAL-AND-CLASS] Independent Unions Banned by Russian Seperatists in LNR<br><br>Sorry Julian, can you produce any evidence its a forgery? If the unions in question publish it I tend to believe them not some blogger who produces a pack of lies about individuals and unions he knows nothing about.<br>Chris<br>Sent from my BlackBerry(r) wireless device [...] Chris Ford 2015-02-23T12:25:36+00:00 2015-02-23T12:25:36+00:00 Re: Independent Unions Banned by Russian Seperatists in LNR https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CAPITAL-AND-CLASS;c9281e7b.1502 Sorry Julian, can you produce any evidence its a forgery? If the unions in question publish it I tend to believe them not some blogger who produces a pack of lies about individuals and unions he knows nothing about.<br>Chris<br>Sent from my BlackBerry\ufffd\ufffd wireless device<br><br>-----Original Message-----<br>From: Julian Wells <julianwells@gn.apc.org><br>Date: Mon, 23 Feb 2015 12:04:02<br>To: Chris Ford<cpford@AOL.COM>; Alan Freeman<afreeman@iwgvt.org><br>Cc: <CAPITAL-AND-CLASS@JISCMAIL.AC.UK><br>Subject: Re: Independent Unions Banned by Russian Seperatists in LNR [...] Julian Wells 2015-02-23T12:04:02+00:00 2015-02-23T12:04:02+00:00 Re: Independent Unions Banned by Russian Seperatists in LNR https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CAPITAL-AND-CLASS;eb8b5541.1502 The people of the Donbass appear to face an unpalatable choice between rival gangs of oligarchs. In the circumstances, it is not unreasonable to choose the gang who will at least allow one to speak one's native language.<br><br>As to the matter in hand, Chris's method of verifying evidence is akin to accepting the Titchborne Claimant's case on the basis of the photographs flourished by his supporters. [...] Chris Ford 2015-02-23T06:42:48-05:00 2015-02-23T06:42:48-05:00 Re: Independent Unions Banned by Russian Seperatists in LNR https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CAPITAL-AND-CLASS;7b8e4912.1502 Allan,<br><br>The only evidence it is fake is a rant by this person on his blog which<br>includes smears and lies about Ukrainian unions and individual<br>activists. I tend to rely on the actual trade unions in Ukraine - who<br>have been distributing this document wide in Ukraine. As I am sure<br>you read the Ukrainian trade union sites and are in contact with active<br>trade unionists there you must be aware of this fact.
